architectural_notes: Trips & Payment tabs: date range should default to full calendar year for selected year (current year by default), but remain user-editable.

existing_features.title: Change the date-range behavior so that the "Trips & Payment" experience defaults to a full-year range (Jan 1 to Dec 31) for the current year, while still allowing users to manually change the start/end dates.

Apply the full-year default and year-selection behavior only to the Trips & Payment-related tabs ("Trip History" and "Trips & Payment"), and do not change the default date range behavior for other tabs (e.g., Daily, Summary, Expense, Overall).

Add a year selector for the Trips & Payment-related tabs that defaults to the current year; when the user selects a different year, automatically set the date range to the full-year range for that selected year (Jan 1–Dec 31).

new_feature_requests.summary: Default Trips & Payment tabs date range filter to full year (Jan 1–Dec 31) of current year; allow users to change year and still apply full-year range, and allow manual date range changes
